text: Microbacter margulisiae is a Gram-negative, anaerobic, non-spore-forming and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Microbacter which has been isolated from sediments from the Tinto River in Huelva in Spain. == References == == External links == *Type strain of Microbacter margulisiae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Microbacter margulisiae
